about_the_game:
NOTE: THE MAIN GAME X-PLANE 10 IS NOT AVAILABLE ANYMORE! PLEASE ONLY PURCHASE DLCS WHEN YOU ARE ALREADY OWNER OF X-PLANE 10!


Fly the "Porsche of the skies" now also in X-Plane! Eperience a new feel for flying with the Mooney M20J by the famous Carenado development team. Set new speed records.

This X-Plane version includes a highly detailed interior and exterior model, full moving and animated rudder and flaps, light effects and als a brilliant interactive virtual cockpit. The Mooney is the perfect aircraft for VFR and IFR flights! The ultra realistic performance is based on a detailed documentation and observation of experienced Moony pilots.

Features


  • Three different paint schemes plus a blank texture
  • Polygon optimized model
  • Standard model
  • Four places
  • Internal dynamic reflexes and normal mapping effects
  • IFR certification
  • Default X-Plane 10 GNS430
  • Scroll wheel support
  • Internal dynamic reflections (Can be turned off)
  • Includes: Interactive virtual cockpit
  • Full moving parts: Ailerons, elevators, rudders, flaps and trim tab
  • Animated Cowl Flaps, Opening doors, Sun Visor
  • Navigation lights, beacons, landing lights
  • Custom sounds
  • 3D pilot
  • Many details as: pitot pressure chamber, antennas, fuel caps, yoke, moving key ring and moving radio cable
  • Custom panel and gauges
  • Toggle yoke at VC
  • Normal Procedures, Emergency Checklist, Autopilot quick reference manual, Performance tables
detailed_description:
NOTE: THE MAIN GAME X-PLANE 10 IS NOT AVAILABLE ANYMORE! PLEASE ONLY PURCHASE DLCS WHEN YOU ARE ALREADY OWNER OF X-PLANE 10!


Fly the "Porsche of the skies" now also in X-Plane! Eperience a new feel for flying with the Mooney M20J by the famous Carenado development team. Set new speed records.

This X-Plane version includes a highly detailed interior and exterior model, full moving and animated rudder and flaps, light effects and als a brilliant interactive virtual cockpit. The Mooney is the perfect aircraft for VFR and IFR flights! The ultra realistic performance is based on a detailed documentation and observation of experienced Moony pilots.

Features


  • Three different paint schemes plus a blank texture
  • Polygon optimized model
  • Standard model
  • Four places
  • Internal dynamic reflexes and normal mapping effects
  • IFR certification
  • Default X-Plane 10 GNS430
  • Scroll wheel support
  • Internal dynamic reflections (Can be turned off)
  • Includes: Interactive virtual cockpit
  • Full moving parts: Ailerons, elevators, rudders, flaps and trim tab
  • Animated Cowl Flaps, Opening doors, Sun Visor
  • Navigation lights, beacons, landing lights
  • Custom sounds
  • 3D pilot
  • Many details as: pitot pressure chamber, antennas, fuel caps, yoke, moving key ring and moving radio cable
  • Custom panel and gauges
  • Toggle yoke at VC
  • Normal Procedures, Emergency Checklist, Autopilot quick reference manual, Performance tables

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04LTS or compatible
  • Processor: 3 GHz, multi-core CPU (or, even better, multiple processors)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: with at least 512 MB of VRAM
  • Storage: 130 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04LTS or compatible
  • Processor: 3 GHz, multi-core CPU (or, even better, multiple processors)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: with 2 GB of on-board, dedicated VRAM
  • Storage: 130 MB available space

  • Storage: 130 MB available space
